question.body: Which of the following is a movement that requires conscious control of the tongue muscles?

multiple_choice.choice: Pushing food back to be swallowed

response.feedback: Incorrect. Although the movement of the tongue to shape the bolus can be conscious, it is mostly an unconscious or automatic motion.
Incorrect. Although using the tongue to position food for swallowing can be conscious, it is mostly an unconscious or automatic motion.
Incorrect. Although the movement of the tongue to help position food for chewing can be conscious, it is mostly an unconscious or automatic motion.
Correct. Speech requires conscious control of the tongue.
